alert.note: Alert for Adair; Adams; Clarke; Dallas; Madison; Polk; Union; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 12:44PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Polk, Madison, Union, northeastern Adams, northern Clarke, southern Dallas, southeastern Adair and Warren Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1243 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Adel to 6 miles west of Winterset to 10 miles southwest of Greenfield. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail and additional rainfall up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Waukee, Winterset, De Soto and Van Meter around 1250 PM CDT. Jordan Creek Town Center around 1255 PM CDT. West Des Moines and Creston around 100 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Avenue Of The Saints Event Center, Norwalk, Des Moines Int`l Airport, Indianola and Carlisle. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 36 and 71. Interstate 80 between mile markers 97 and 121. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Adams; Clarke; Dallas; Madison; Polk; Union; Warren
